column4: I dislike how there's no system notifications in the notification applet in jaunty. If the indicator applet is for that, it's never worked. It worked in alpha, I've to see it start up now, so I disabled it.
i dont even know what the indicator applet indicates
I wouldn't say it sucks, but it's rather in development, just like the notifications. If you want a very solid distro, go for a LTS release.
